channel.title: seanreiser tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from seanreiser.

item.description: @fontawesome Please keep them separate. O I don't know when but I suspect someday I'll need to iconify the difference between iPhone regular and Pro
item.source:markdown: @fontawesome Please keep them separate. O I don't know when but I suspect someday I'll need to iconify the difference between iPhone regular and Pro

item.description: @davewiner I'm about a mile from Utopia Bagels and have a vacuum sealer. I wonder if bagels would survive being sealed and overnighted. I'd be happy to help you get your fix every now and then.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner I'm about a mile from Utopia Bagels and have a vacuum sealer. I wonder if bagels would survive being sealed and overnighted. I'd be happy to help you get your fix every now and then.
